mapper.select: select q.qaNo, q.qaContent, q.qaDate, q.userId, q.pNo, m.userNickName from qa q, member m where q.pNo=#{pNo} and q.userId=m.userId order by q.qaNo
select r.reviewNo, r.reviewContent, r.reviewDate,r.reviewGrade, r.userId, r.reviewNo, m.userNickName from review r, member m where r.pNo=#{pNo} and r.userId=m.userId order by r.reviewNo
